activities: Maintenance of customer contact and billing information.  Linode, LLC (herein referred to as "Linode") collects and stores personal information, including the full name, company name (if applicable), billing address, credit card number and expiration date, email address, and source IP address for all customers. In some cases, photographic proof of identity and credit card credentials may be required prior to customer account activation.
address: 329 E. Jimmie Leeds Road, Suite A
